name: SmashTris
description:
SmashTris is a 1-vs-1 Tetris-like battle where players compete against each other for glory. Compete on side-by-side playzones, where competitors fight for the next available piece. Puzzle pieces are different to traditional Tetris tetromino pieces, making for extra unique gameplay.

Defend against opponent attacks by clearing single lines. This boosts your power meter and slows your drop rate giving you more time to place your puzzle pieces.

Attack your opponent by using combos. There are currently 2 combos available:

  1. Multi-line - clear 2 or more lines at the same time
  2. Solid-line - clear a line with all one colour

Single-player gaming is also available - compete against the computer AI.
